Class AuthManager

Object
AuthManager
public class AuthManager extends Object
Controller class to manage user authentication and registration.

  • Method Details

    • userExists

      public boolean userExists(String userID)
      Checks if a user exists in the system.
      Parameters:
      userID - The User ID to check.
      Returns:
      true if user exists, false otherwise.

    • login

      public User login(String userID, String password)
      Validates user credentials.
      Parameters:
      userID - The User ID.
      password - The password.
      Returns:
      The User object on success, or null on failure.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object.
      oldPassword - The user's current password.
      newPassword - The user's new password.
      Returns:
      true on success, false otherwise.

    • registerRepresentative

      public CompanyRepresentative registerRepresentative(String userID, String name, String email, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Registers a new company representative.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID (email).
      name - The user's full name.
      email - The user's email.
      companyName - The company name.
      department - The department.
      position - The position.
      Returns:
      The new CompanyRepresentative object, or null if user ID already exists.
